title: Avert Your Eyes!
description:
Bomani Jones gives you the blow-by-blow from the most exciting part of the NFL preseason, the big brawl in the stands at the Rams-Chargers game (1:11). Plus, why fans shouldn’t get too hyped up about the performance of rookie quarterbacks so far (15:56), as well as an IYHH including China creating a “blacklist” of karaoke songs (22:13) and your voicemails from the wildest thing you’ve heard at a barbershop (34:14)!

IYHH Stories


@dalvin_brown asks how should self-driving cars make life or death decisions? Ideally, they won’t: https://wapo.st/2VVUMvS


Koh Ewe of @vice shares that China is making a “blacklist” of bad karaoke songs: https://bit.ly/3xRqHLo



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Blow-by-blow of the brawl at a Rams preseason game, wildest barbershop 'tall tales'!
